text: anytime you interact with your customers
you want to delight them with a
personalized experience creating a
delightful experience with traditional
on-premises contact centers is difficult
they're expensive to maintain and it can
take months to make even the simplest of
changes we realized this at amazon.com
so we decided to build our own contact
center allowing us to better serve our
customers we scaled it to support
millions of Amazon customers and over a
billion unique customer interactions and
now we've made this technology available
to you
Amazon Connect is an easy-to-use
omni-channel cloud contact center
enabling you to seamlessly deliver
dynamic natural and personalized
experiences that enhance your customer
service every customer interaction you
create an Amazon connect is immediately
available across voice and chat channels
without any duplication of effort saving
you time and money you can easily
introduce chatbots into your customer
experiences by using the same natural
language understanding technology that
powers Alexa and you don't have to be an
engineer to do it now your Amazon
Connect contact center can deduce what
your customers actually mean and not
just the words they say or type behind
the scenes every conversation across
every channel can be analyzed by AWS
machine learning and artificial
intelligence allowing you to understand
your customer conversations without
having to manually audit every contact
with low pay-as-you-go pricing you can
save up to 80% over other contact
centers there's also no upfront
commitments licensing or maintenance
fees so in the time it took you to watch
this video you could have set up your
contact center and started providing a
better customer experience seriously
stop maintaining legacy solutions and
see how Amazon connect empowers you to
start innovating
